answerText: Catwoman [accept The Cat][10] Catwoman is a villainess associated with this DC superhero, who has been most recently played on film by Christian Bale in such films as The Dark Knight.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 16 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This character's original origin story said that she was an amnesiac flight attendant. For 10 points each: [10] Name this criminal, a thief and vigilante whose real name is Selina Kyle. She has been played on film by Michelle Pfeiffer and Halle Berry and is set to be played by Anne Hathaway in an upcoming movie.
